It was the first week of summer break and a small group of friends had gotten together for an evening of fun.

"So, what'll we do?" asks Kyle, one arm holding Valerie around the waist.

"How about a contest?" suggests Amy.

"What sort of contest?" asks Valerie, her head resting on Kyle's shoulder.

"A contest on pretty much everything!" replies Amy cheerfully.

"Sure! We could make it on-going and keep a tally!" suggests Thomas.

"What sort of things would we compete over?" asks Jo.

"Well, lets make a list," replies Thomas, "every week we make a new list and compete over the course of the week."

After a few minutes of thinking, a list was formed for contests to perform.

1. Being able to lift the most weight by the end of the week

8. Playing at the most sports games by the end of the week
9. reading the most by the end of the week

The Rules:
1. no killing off any of the initial group of friends
2. stick to swaps with people local to the town (no celebrities)
3. no ending the story
4. max of 2 changes per week of competition
5. max of 1 day elapsed per chapter
